## Source: ossf-package-analysis (2d25fdeb9912953dee8657737ed45cf80388580eb8d6a9ab61a46be72ef1b1a6)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'testjsonn1' @ 0.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
